testsuite.name: loginFunctionality

testcase.name: Verify Go1Percent logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message
Verify that tag line with text "Get 1% Better Everyday" is displayed
Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button

error.message: An error occurred while running .click() command on <@carouselButton>: Timed out while waiting for element "@carouselButton" with "css selector" to be present for 5000 milliseconds.

testcase.name: Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed
Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page
Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page

failure.message: Testing if the URL contains 'login.microsoftonline.com/' in 5000ms - expected "contains 'login.microsoftonline.com/'" but got: "https://auth.go1percent.com/auth/realms/nashtech/protocol/openid-connect/auth?client_id=leaderboard-qa-ui&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fnashtechglobal.qa.go1percent.com%2Fmy-dashboard&state=63bba60c-71dd-40a3-896d-463a078259a4&response_mode=fragment&response_type=code&scope=openid&nonce=66c59a12-90c5-4ba3-a948-a05275bb8c29" (5107ms)

testcase.name: Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login
Verify clicking on the Terms of Use link opens a new page with the terms of use
Verify clicking on the Privacy policy link opens a new page with the privacy policy Verify Privacy Policy Page
Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed
Verify successful login with valid credentials
